name: Castle Crusader
description:
Made for the Fireside Jam 2022. Use "W" and "S" to move the Knight to defend the castle. When the energy meter is full use "Space" to unleash his magic shield and make it grow! Make sure the enemies do not make it to the castle and save the day! (Currently it is just a go as long as you can game)

W - Move up

S - Move down

Space - Extends when energy is full
